CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 13, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Steeds On Parade - No.1: The Indoor Horse Show for the benefit of Hill City, at Hunt Armory next Thursday, Friday and Saturday, will be one of teh greatest and most unique sports events ever staged here. In this photo, Sam Linetsky, who will have several horses in show, puts one fo his steeds through the paces in preparation for the exhibit...-Courier Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Sam Linetsky seated on light colored horse in Hunt Armory
